bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

nplcit.text: Gokhale, Maya and Graham, Paul. Reconfigurable Computing: Accelerating Computation with Field-Programmable Gate Arrays. Springer. 2005. pp. 1-54 and 92-96

abstract.p: A high speed system and method for processing financial instrument order data are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to monitor a financial instrument order based on a risk profile to determine whether the order is appropriate. If determined appropriate, a financial instrument order can be routed to a trading venue. With respect to another exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to maintain a financial instrument order book.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR HIGH SPEED OPTIONS PRICING
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME POUR UNE FIXATION DE PRIX D'OPTIONS TRES RAPIDE

abstract.p: A high speed technique for options pricing in the financial industry is d isclosed that can provide both high throughput and low latency. A parallel/p ipelined architecture is disclosed for computing an implied volatility in co nnection with an option. Parallel/pipelined architectures are also disclosed for computing an option's theoretical fair price. Preferably these parallel /pipelined architectures are deployed in hardware, and more preferably recon figurable logic such as Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) to accelerate the options pricing operations relative to conventional software-based opti ons pricing operations.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HIGH SPEED PROCESSING OF FINANCIAL INFORMATION
PROCEDE ET DISPOSITIF POUR LE TRAITEMENT A GRANDE VITESSE D'INFORMATIONS FINANCIERES

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using reconfigurable logic are disclosed. Various functional operations to be performed on the financial market data can be implemented in firmware pipelines to accelerate the speed of processing. Also, a combination of software logic and firmware logic can be used to efficiently control and manage the high speed flow of financial market data to and from the reconfigurable logic.

Method and System for High Speed Options Pricing

abstract.p: A high speed technique for options pricing in the financial industry is disclosed that can provide both high throughput and low latency. A parallel/pipelined architecture is disclosed for computing an implied volatility in connection with an option. Parallel/pipelined architectures are also disclosed for computing an option's theoretical fair price. Preferably these parallel/pipelined architectures are deployed in hardware, and more preferably reconfigurable logic such as Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) to accelerate the options pricing operations relative to conventional software-based options pricing operations.

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using reconfigurable logic are disclosed. Various functional operations to be performed on the financial market data can be implemented in firmware pipelines to accelerate the speed of processing. Also, a combination of software logic and firmware logic can be used to efficiently control and manage the high speed flow of financial market data to and from the reconfigurable logic.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) receive the financial market data messages, and (2) process each received financial market data message to update a stored record for the financial instrument associated with that message.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) receive the financial market data messages, and (2) process each received financial market data message to update a stored record for the financial instrument associated with that message.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

nplcit.text: Gokhale, Maya B. & Graham, Paul S. Reconfigurable Computing. Springer. 2005. pp. 3, 7, 11-15 and 92-93
Gokhale, Maya B. & Graham, Paul S. Reconfigurable Computing: Accelerating Computation With Field-Programmable Gate Arrays. Springer. 2005. pp. 1-36

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing financial instrument order books are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) process streaming financial market data, the streaming financial market data comprising a plurality of messages representative of a plurality of offers to buy and sell a plurality of financial instruments, and (2) maintain in real-time a plurality of financial instrument order books based on the messages

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing financial instrument order books are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) process streaming financial market data, the streaming financial market data comprising a plurality of messages representative of a plurality of offers to buy and sell a plurality of financial instruments, and (2) maintain in real-time a plurality of financial instrument order books based on the messages.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a record memory is employed to store a plurality of records for a plurality of financial instruments, and a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) receive financial market data messages, (2) retrieve from the record memory the records for the messages' associated financial instruments, (3) process each received financial market data message to update the record for the financial instrument associated with that message, and wherein each record comprises an interest list that identifies whether any of a plurality of entities have expressed an interest in being notified of data relating to the updated record.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a record memory is employed to store a plurality of records for a plurality of financial instruments, and a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) receive financial market data messages, (2) retrieve from the record memory the records for the messages' associated financial instruments, (3) process each received financial market data message to update the record for the financial instrument associated with that message, and wherein each record comprises an interest list that identifies whether any of a plurality of entities have expressed an interest in being notified of data relating to the updated record.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

nplcit.text: Gokhale, Maya B. & Graham, Paul S. Reconfigurable Computing. Springer. 2005. pp. 1-36

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using a reconfigurable logic device are disclosed. Various operations such as basket calculation and volume weighted average price (VWAP) operations can be performed on the financial market data using firmware logic deployed on the reconfigurable logic device to accelerate the speed of processing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using a reconfigurable logic device are disclosed. Various operations such as basket calculation and volume weighted average price (VWAP) operations can be performed on the financial market data using firmware logic deployed on the reconfigurable logic device to accelerate the speed of processing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

nplcit.text: Gokhale, Maya B. & Graham, Paul S. Reconfigurable Computing: Accelerating Computation with Field-Programmable Gate Arrays. Springer. 2005. pp. 1-36
Gokhale, Maya B. & Graham, Paul S. Reconfigurable Computing: Accelerating Computation With Field-Programmable Gate Arrays. Springer. 2005. pp. 1-36

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to (1) receive the financial market data messages, and (2) parse each received financial market data message into its constituent data fields.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to map the symbols present in the financial market data messages to another symbology.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and System for High Speed Options Pricing

abstract.p: A high speed technique for options pricing in the financial industry is disclosed that can provide both high throughput and low latency. Parallel/pipelined architectures are disclosed for computing an option's theoretical fair price. Preferably these parallel/pipelined architectures are deployed in hardware, and more preferably reconfigurable logic such as Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) to accelerate the options pricing operations relative to conventional software-based options pricing operations.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing financial instrument order books are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to synthesize quote events associated with a plurality of financial instruments from a financial market data feed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to generate a plurality of financial market data messages from a plurality of the data fields, each generated message having a specified message format.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using a reconfigurable logic device are disclosed. Various operations such as volume weighted average price (VWAP) operations can be performed on the financial market data using firmware logic deployed on the reconfigurable logic device to accelerate the speed of processing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: High Speed Processing of Financial Information Using FPGA Devices

abstract.p: A high speed apparatus and method for processing a plurality of financial market data messages are disclosed. With respect to an exemplary embodiment, a reconfigurable logic device is employed to map the symbols present in the financial market data messages to another symbology.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR HIGH SPEED OPTIONS PRICING
PROCÉDÉ ET SYSTÈME POUR UNE FIXATION DE PRIX D'OPTIONS TRÈS RAPIDE

abstract.p: A high speed technique for options pricing in the financial industry is disclosed that can provide both high throughput and low latency. A parallel/pipelined architecture is disclosed for computing an implied volatility in connection with an option. Parallel/pipelined architectures are also disclosed for computing an option's theoretical fair price. Preferably these parallel/pipelined architectures are deployed in hardware, and more preferably reconfigurable logic such as Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) to accelerate the options pricing operations relative to conventional software-based options pricing operations.

L'invention concerne une technique très rapide pour fixer le prix d'options dans l'industrie financière qui peut fournir à la fois un débit élevé et une faible latence. Une architecture parallèle/en pipeline est décrite pour calculer une volatilité impliquée conjointement avec une option. Des architectures parallèles/en pipeline sont également décrites pour calculer le juste prix théorique des options. De préférence, ces architectures parallèles/en pipeline sont déployées sous forme matérielle, et plus préférablement sous forme de circuits logiques reconfigurables tels que des circuits FPGA afin d'accélérer les opérations de fixation de prix d'options par rapport aux mêmes opérations basées sur des logiciels classiques.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HIGH SPEED PROCESSING OF FINANCIAL INFORMATION
PROCÉDÉ ET DISPOSITIF POUR LE TRAITEMENT À GRANDE VITESSE D'INFORMATIONS FINANCIÈRES

nplcit.text: SCHMERKEN I.: 'With HyperFeed Litigation Pending, Exegy Launches Low-Latency Ticker Plant' BLOG, [Online] 20 March 2007, pages 1 - 13 Retrieved from the Internet: <URL:http://www.wallstreetandtech.com/blog/archives/2007/03on_the_heels_of.html>

abstract.p: Methods and systems for processing financial market data using reconfigurable logic are disclosed. Various functional operations to be performed on the financial market data can be implemented in firmware pipelines to accelerate the speed of processing. Also, a combination of software logic and firmware logic can be used to efficiently control and manage the high speed flow of financial market data to and from the reconfigurable logic.

Des procédés et des systèmes pour traiter des données de marchés financiers en utilisant une logique reconfigurable sont présentés. Diverses opérations fonctionnelles à effectuer sur les données de marchés financiers peuvent être mises en oevre dans des pipelines de micrologiciel pour accélérer la vitesse de traitement. Par ailleurs, une combinaison de logique de logiciel et de logique de micrologiciel peut être utilisée pour commander et gérer efficacement le flux à grande vitesse de données de marchés financiers vers et en provenance de la logique reconfigurable.
